column4: I am a new ubuntu (edgy) user: someone knows if it is possible to watch the services at startup in redhat/fedora/suse style ?
sure, temporarily? (one boot)? or for good?
do you want to watch it all startup just once? or forever?

ah, ok.  at grub (right after your POST screen, hit escape to go to the grub menu), then pick the kernel you want (should be on top), hit "e" to edit it, remove the "quiet" and "splash" options, then hit 'b'
